name: @uk-us/chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension to highlight UK and US spellings

scripts.build: npm run build:popup && npm run build:content && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp src/popup.html dist/popup.html && cp ../ui-shared/styles.css dist/styles.css && cp src/highlight.css dist/highlight.css && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp icons/*.png dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.watch: npm run build:popup -- --watch & npm run build:content -- --watch
